data.title: Guest lecture by UNCTAD Trade and Logistics Chief Jan Hoffmann in maritime economics
data.meta_description: Many thanks to UNCTAD Trade and Logistics Chief Jan Hoffmann for sharing valuable insights on the maritime industry with the master students of my Maritime
data.text: Many thanks to UNCTAD Trade and Logistics Chief Jan Hoffmann for sharing valuable insights on the maritime industry with the master students of my Maritime Economics class at USN today. The lecture started with a detailed maritime country profile analysis of Norway followed by long-term trend before COVID, waves of supply and demand during COVID and long-term perspective after COVID.
